article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 13,000 killed in Gaza.
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  13,000  people  have  now  been  killed  in  the  Palestinian  enclave  since  the  war  with  Israel  began.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 13,000 killed in Gaza.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 13,000 killed in Gaza.
